channel.title: 美联社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪美联社news的种子

item.title: 周四，联邦法官结束了对六名密西西比州前白人执法人员的刑期判决，他们承认在没有逮捕令的情况下闯入民宅并折磨两名黑人。
item.description:
A federal judge on Thursday finished handing down prison terms to six white former Mississippi law enforcement officers who pleaded guilty to breaking into a home without a warrant and torturing two Black men. pic.twitter.com/afKpQpD6Bz

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 耐克协议结束了德国足球与阿迪达斯的长期合作关系
item.description:

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 杜肯大学赢得了自 1969 年以来的首场 NCAA 锦标赛，创造了历史。"疯狂三月 "取消了课程，"罗伯特-希利三世（Robert Healy III）在 X 上写道，"去庆祝吧。我会想办法的"。
item.description:
Duquesne made history by winning its first NCAA Tournament game since 1969.
A school professor is giving Dukes fans time to enjoy it.

“Class canceled due to March Madness,” Robert Healy III posted on X. “Go celebrate. I’ll figure it out.” https://t.co/aWedLvSMiR

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 引用苏斯博士的名言 "只管走，走，走！"联邦法官驳回布拉戈耶维奇政治复出诉讼案

item.title: 在第二次世界大战期间，被称为 "幽灵军团 "的美军部队凭借充气坦克、无线电通信、服装制服和表演，智取敌军。他们的任务被保密了几十年，但在本周四，这支部队被授予了国会金质奖章。
item.description:
With inflatable tanks, radio trickery, costume uniforms and acting, the American military units known as the Ghost Army outwitted the enemy during World War II. Their mission was kept secret for decades, but on Thursday the group was awarded the Congressional Gold Medal. pic.twitter.com/K6c4QWi5Ns

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 祝你好运，马库斯-多马斯克。这位伊利诺伊州的前锋打出了 NCAA 男子锦标赛自 2019 年以来的首个三双：12 分、11 个篮板和 10 次助攻。
item.description:
Have a game, Marcus Domask. The Illinois forward has the first triple-double that the NCAA men’s tournament has seen since 2019: 12 points, 11 rebounds, 10 assists.

Follow AP's live March Madness coverage. https://t.co/2La1CA0yhV

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 21, 2024
